Uses of Class
com.google.bitcoin.utils.BtcFormat.Builder

  • Packages that use BtcFormat.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.google.bitcoin.utils  

    • Uses of BtcFormat.Builder in com.google.bitcoin.utils

      Methods in com.google.bitcoin.utils that return BtcFormat.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.builder()
      Return a new BtcFormat.Builder object.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.code(String val)
      Specify a custom currency code to be used in the denomination-unit indicators of formatted values.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.fractionDigits(int val)
      Specify the number of decimal places in the fraction part of formatted numbers.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.fractionGroups(int... val)
      Specify the sizes of a variable number of optional decimal-place groups in the fraction part of formatted values.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.locale(Locale val)
      Specify the Locale for formatting and parsing.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.localizedPattern(String val)
      Use the given localized-pattern for formatting and parsing.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.minimumFractionDigits(int val)
      Specify the minimum number of decimal places in the fraction part of formatted values.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.pattern(String val)
      Use the given pattern when formatting and parsing.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.scale(int val)
      Specify a fixed-denomination of units to use when formatting and parsing values.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.style(BtcAutoFormat.Style val)
      Specify the new BtcFormat is to be automatically-denominating.
      BtcFormat.Builder BtcFormat.Builder.symbol(String val)
      Specify a currency symbol to be used in the denomination-unit indicators of formatted values.
